name: The Art Of Knuckle Sandwich
description: You've trained since you were barely able to walk, creating secret techniques and forms to develop a new martial art known as Knuckle Sandwich. Now with your art perfected you approach the masters of martial arts in your land and demand recognition for your discipline.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 1.8ghz dual core+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
